name: Arc'teryx Sabria Pants - Women's
description: Sleek, durable and lightweight, these are high-performing pants for hiking in technical terrain. A fabric blend of nylon and elastane provides stretch  for high-stepping on rugged trails, and is DWR-treated to help you stay dry long enough to layer up. The low profile waistband is designed to sit comfortably under a pack, and zippered thigh pockets sit below a hipbelt for access when you're on the move.Durable, quick-drying nylon fabric with plenty of stretch.DWR treated for water resistance.Comfortable pull-on waist with internal adjuster.Gusseted crotch for comfort and mobility.Articulated knees.Twin zippered, mesh-lined thigh pockets.UPF rating 50+.Built to the highest standards, with a women's specific design.
